name: VirtualEncounter
title: Virtual Encounter
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Includes concepts that represent an encounter using online modalities.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Encounter.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent an encounter using online modalities.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent encounters other than online.)

Qualified nonphysician health care professional online digital assessment and management, for an established patient, for up to 7 days, cumulative time during the 7 days; 21 or more minutes
